slepc-3.18.3 2023-03-24
Report Typos and Errors

DSSVDSetDimensions

Sets the number of columns for a DSSVD.

Synopsis

#include "slepcds.h" 
PetscErrorCode DSSVDSetDimensions(DS ds,PetscInt m)
Logically Collective on ds

Input Parameters

ds  - the direct solver context
m  - the number of columns

Notes

This call is complementary to DSSetDimensions(), to provide a dimension that is specific to this DS type.

See Also

DSSVDGetDimensions(), DSSetDimensions()

Level

intermediate

Location

src/sys/classes/ds/impls/svd/dssvd.c
